abstract: New York Yankees top minor league club, Scranton/Wilkes Barre Yankees, will play its home games at several locations next year, while its home field undergoes renovations; other MLB news noted.
snippet: The Scranton/Wilkes-Barre Yankees, the team’s top minor league club, will play its home games at several locations next year, mostly at Frontier Field in Rochester, N.Y.
lead_paragraph: The Scranton/Wilkes-Barre Yankees, the team’s top minor league club, will play its home games at several locations next year, mostly at Frontier Field in Rochester, N.Y.

headline.main: Season on Road for Yankees’ Farm Team
headline.print_headline: Season on Road for Yankees’ Farm Team
